name: NodeXperts
0:
”Alexa, ask nodexperts to tell me about their portfolio.”
”Alexa, ask nodexperts who gave talks at the javascript conferences?”
”Alexa, ask nodexperts how can I contact them?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nodexperts
des:
This skill will tell you about JavaScript software company, NodeXperts. 

You can ask, what kind of apps they have delivered, about their and much more.
It's a simple question/answer type of skill. You can say "demo questions", to get an idea of what kind of question you can ask.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
